TopicTitle: A noob question for the devs.

Articles.Content: The new update has been said to include the astronaut training complex. What I would like to know is the list of features that will be added by the complex. I know that we can choose astronauts and recruit new ones, but what would this entail exactly? Will this include astronaut training? Because I would love to develop specific astronauts' capabilities for my missions.

No one really knows, and we (probably) won't know until it's actually released. We can assume that we will be able to pick our Kerbonauts for each flight, but other than that we can only speculate.

(And I know you said message to the developers, in the title. That's just my two cents.)

Is the new astronaut complex an actual building? I haven't heard much about it.

There's a new "tab" like the action groups one which you can use to select the crew, that's the only thing I've heard about crew management.
I am confident that the astronaut complex is a new building. I doubt that we will be able to train the Kerbals...yet.

It's a new building, and it changes the way kerbals are handled for flights (you can choose who goes in what module, test-fly things with only one kerbal). No training yet, but there's a big list of possible recruits, showing their personality stats (so we can recruit an army of Jebs)
